description: Set a version as default version for a hook in CloudFormation Registry.

TypeVersionArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the type version.
TypeVersionArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the type version.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:cloudformation:[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,64}:([0-9]{12})?:type/hook/.+$  

Update requires: No interruption

TypeName.description:
The name of the type being registered.

We recommend that type names adhere to the following pattern: company_or_organization::service::type.
TypeName.markdownDescription:
The name of the type being registered.

We recommend that type names adhere to the following pattern: company_or_organization::service::type.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}$  

Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the type. This is used to uniquely identify a HookDefaultVersion
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the type. This is used to uniquely identify a HookDefaultVersion

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:cloudformation:[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,64}:([0-9]{12})?:type/hook/.+$  

Update requires: No interruption

VersionId.description: The ID of an existing version of the hook to set as the default.
VersionId.markdownDescription:
The ID of an existing version of the hook to set as the default.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,128}$  

Update requires: No interruption
